---
title: "Walkability in Wellington"
event: "WOSSAT - Wellington Open Source Show and Tell"
date: 2019-05-16
---

This talk presents a methodology to calculate and model walkability to get geospatially relevant insights. The walkability calculation introduced is a novel approach that looks at local walkability and how even neighbourhood walking can be prohibitive due to the topography of Wellington.
